articles.content: Betty White championed for animals throughout her decades long career, and her legacy lived on Sunday evening when John Travolta's son, Ben, adopted the dog that was brought on stage by Jamie Lee Cur… [+5536 chars]

articles.title: Will Doja Cat, Olivia Rodrigo, or Billie Eilish Win Big at the Grammys? | Diary of a Song - The New York Times
articles.description: Only in record of the year could Lil Nas X and Olivia Rodrigo face off against Abba and Tony Bennett. Our critics break down all 10 nominees in a new “Diary ...
